label: 雅楽寮
対訳語: Bureau of Music - Also read Utaryō.
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: Bureau (ryō) under the Ministry of Civil Administration (Jibushō). In charge of music, dances, musicians, dancers, and other participants in the various religious and political ceremonies. [治部省]
